More:
I tried to make it as simple as possible.

I used an en dash to frame the table (alt + -). This should be optional, but I like how it encloses the table.

Besides that I used a hashtag for the table headings and \pipes\" to divide the table rows. I think it looks clean and is easy to interpret."

I like the markup to be as simple as possible, so I chose between option 1 and 3. I went with option 1 as it puts more weight to the main headlines. It makes the hierarchy more visual. H1 is \bigger\" than H3."
